summary: This document is an email chain from October 2020, forwarded within an organization. It contains a forwarded message from Bryan Miller making serious allegations against Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew, claiming Maxwell recruited a girl for modeling who was instead sold into sexual slavery and torture, and that Prince Andrew was an accessory to her death. The sender is passing it along per standard practice.

persons.name: Bryan Miller
persons.context: Author of the original email making allegations about Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew, claiming a girl was recruited for modeling and sold into sexual slavery and torture.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Allegedly recruited a girl for a modeling career in the 1990s, who was instead sold as a slave for sex and torture.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Alleged to have been an accessory to a girl's death, torturing her and forcing her murder.

connections.description: Bryan Miller is making direct allegations against Ghislaine Maxwell regarding the recruitment and alleged enslavement of a girl.
Both are named together in allegations of involvement in the torture and death of a girl.
Bryan Miller is making direct allegations against Prince Andrew regarding torture and being an accessory to murder.

events.title: Email allegations sent
events.description: Bryan Miller sends an email making allegations about Maxwell and Prince Andrew, and requests help obtaining a passport.

events.title: Email forwarded
events.description: The email chain is forwarded within an organization per standard practice.

keyFacts: Bryan Miller alleges that in the 1990s, Ghislaine Maxwell recruited a girl for modeling who was instead sold as a slave for sex and torture.
Miller alleges Prince Andrew was an accessory to the girl's death, torturing her and forcing her murder.
Miller requests assistance in obtaining an expedited passport to identify the alleged victim.
The email was forwarded within an organization on October 6, 2020, per their standard practice, indicating it was received and processed.
The allegations contained in the email are extremely serious, involving sexual slavery, torture, and murder.
